### Weather
- High Temperature (°F): 87
- Low Temperature (°F): 68
- Precipitation (in): 0.08
- Wind Speed (mph): 10
- Conditions: Hazy

### Field Notes
- Ambient conditions stable
- No visible sheen or foam at any station
- Cr at WQ-03: 128 µg/L, MCL exceedance

### Compliance Flags
- VIOLATION: Cr at WQ-03 (128 µg/L) exceeds EPA MCL (100 µg/L)
- WARNING: Cr at WQ-04 (80.6 µg/L) approaching MCL threshold
- Enforcement action initiated: Notice of Violation issued to facility at RM 18.6

### Events
- Kayak group passed WQ-03 reach 10:00-11:30, no interference with probes
- WQ-05 DO membrane replaced
- Grab sample chain-of-custody forms submitted to lab

### Notes
- Day 27 monitoring. Cr at WQ-03: 128 µg/L. Enforcement and remediation activities ongoing.
